thread.title: AC Milan’s £622million sale to Chinese buyers set to be finalised by March 3 — once completed, deal will be biggest-ever Chinese investment in European club
thread.title_full: AC Milan’s £622million sale to Chinese buyers set to be finalised by March 3 — once completed, deal will be biggest-ever Chinese investment in European club

author: arichardson
title: AC Milan’s £622million sale to Chinese buyers set to be finalised by March 3 — once completed, deal will be biggest-ever Chinese investment in European club
text:
EFL san sold AC Milan’s £622million sale to Chinese buyers set to be finalised by March 3 — once completed, deal will be biggest-ever Chinese investment in European club 
Former president Silvio Berlusconi had reached agreement in August and deal will see club's 185million debt wiped out Breaking
